services.title: Our Services
services.description: Though web development services are our specialty, we also do superb design to help our clients build top to bottom solutions.

design.title: DesignLab
design.description: Web design services that complete the development cycle

feature1.text: We believe attention to detail and well established business processes differentiate successful projects and those that are just average.

feature2.text: There is no perfect framework or library. Depending on the type of task, we choose the most appropriate tools. We keep a careful eye on emerging web development trends and never compromise best practice.

aboutUs.title:

What We
aboutUs.description: Headquartered in Singapore, CSSSR is a group of companies that brings together top talent based around the globe to produce the highest quality results.

tracker.title: CSSSR.Tracker
tracker.description: We’ve created an app that helps us manage time on our projects. Give it a try.

lms.title: Modular Learning Management System
lms.description: Our LMS helps to start E-Learning business. We offer design and development teams to do all the necessary integrations and personalization. The system is designed to support pedagogical models and help you to streamline your training.
